TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProxyWebPartManager extends System.Web.UI.Control

summary.span: 为开发人员提供一种当内容页的关联母版页中已经声明了 控件的情况下声明内容页中的静态连接的方法。

span.span: Provides a way for developers to declare static connections in a content page when a control has been declared in the content page's associated master page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当已在母版页中声明 控件时,在内容页中声明静态连接的特定方案存在该控件。The control exists for the particular scenario of declaring static connections in content pages when a control has already been declared in a master page. 按照设计, 使用 Web 部件控件的网页必须包含一个 (且仅有一个) 管理页面上所有 Web 部件控件的控件。By design, a Web page that uses Web Parts controls must contain one (and only one) control that manages all Web Parts controls on the page. 当 Web 部件应用程序使用母版页时, 通常将控件放置在母版页中, 这是因为所有内容页都在运行时与母版页合并, 而单个控件将管理所有 Web 部件控件在所有内容页中。When a Web Parts application uses master pages, it is common to place the control in the master page, because all the content pages are merged with the master page at run time and the single control will manage all the Web Parts controls from all content pages. 但是, 当开发人员希望在此类应用程序的内容页中声明静态连接时, 它们似乎面临着局限性。However, when developers want to declare static connections in the content pages of such an application, they might seem to face a limitation. 静态 Web 部件连接只能通过添加``元素作为``元素的子元素来声明, 该元素本身必须``是元素的子元素。A static Web Parts connection can be declared only by adding an `` element as a child of a `` element, which itself must be a child of a `` element. 但由于控件已在母版页中声明, 并且是允许的控件, 因此开发人员无法在内容页中声明其他控件来添加静态连接。But because the control was already declared in the master page, and is the one permitted control, developers cannot declare additional controls in the content pages to add static connections. 控件在此方案中将取代控件。 The control takes the place of the control in this scenario. 开发人员在``其内容页中``声明元素而不是元素, 然后可以将静态连接声明为子元素。Developers declare an `` element instead of an `` element in their content pages, and can then declare static connections as child elements. 在运行时, 控件中的连接只是添加到控件的集合, 并与任何其他连接一样处理。At run time, the connections in the control are simply added to the collection of the control and treated like any other connection. 由于控件仅用于此特定开发方案, 因此它具有比类更多的功能。 Because the control is used only in this particular development scenario, it has more limited functionality than the class. 事实上, 尽管控件充当代理来包含控件在内容页中的静态连接, 但它并不从控件继承。In fact, although the control acts as a proxy to contain static connections for the control in content pages, it does not inherit from the control. 它直接从类继承, 只重写几个基成员。It inherits directly from the class, and overrides only a few of the base members. 、和属性被重写, 并分配了阻止它们被使用的值。 The , , and properties are overridden and assigned values that prevent them from being used. 其他继承属性会被重写以调整其设计时行为, 但其他属性的行为与基属性相同。Other inherited properties are overridden to adjust their design-time behavior, but otherwise they have the same behavior as the base properties. 其中包括和属性。These include the and properties. 最后, 该类有一个非继承属性。Finally, the class has one non-inherited property. 属性返回其自己的静态连接的集合 (对象)。 The property returns its own collection of static connections (a object). 与方法一样, 类也只重写几个方法, 主要是为了限制其使用。As for methods, the class similarly overrides only a few methods, mostly to restrict their use. 如果调用 , 则通过引发异常使继承的方法不可用。The inherited method is made unusable by throwing an exception if called. 方法始终返回一个空的控件集合, 这会使其无法包含控件的集合。The method always returns an empty control collection, which has the effect of preventing it from being able to contain a collection of controls. 最后, 方法调用基方法, 然后将属性引用的连接集合分配给控件的属性。Finally, the method calls the base method, and then assigns the collection of connections referenced by the property to the property of the control. 这会影响所有内容页中声明的所有静态连接, 并使其成为由母版页中的控件所维护的连接集合的一部分。This has the effect of rolling up all the static connections declared in all content pages and making them part of the connections collection maintained by the control in the master page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类在使用母版页的应用程序的内容页上声明静态连接。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to declare static connections on content pages in an application that uses master pages. 该示例包括五个部分:The example has five parts: - 允许您在页上更改 Web 部件显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page. - 接口的源代码和两个用作连接的提供者和使用者的控件。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 承载应用程序的用户控件、内容页和控件的主网页。A master Web page that hosts the user control, the content pages, and the control for the application. - 承载控件的内容网页、两个自定义控件和用于连接两个控件的静态连接。A content Web page that hosts a control, the two custom controls, and a static connection to connect the two controls. - 有关如何运行 "示例" 页的说明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 此代码示例的第一部分是用户控件, 该控件使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 将以下源代码保存到 .ascx 文件, 并为其提供分配给`Src`此用户控件的`Register`指令属性的文件名, 该属性位于宿主母版页顶部附近。Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting master page. 有关显示模式的详细信息以及此控件中源代码的说明, 请参阅[演练:更改 Web 部件页](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)上的显示模式。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] 此代码示例的第二部分是接口和控件的源代码。The second part of the code example is the source code for the interface and controls. 源文件包含一个名为`IZipCode`的简单接口。The source file contains a simple interface named `IZipCode`. 还有一个名为`ZipCodeWebPart`的类, 该类实现接口并充当提供程序控件。There is also a class named `ZipCodeWebPart` that implements the interface and acts as the provider control. 它`ProvideIZipCode`的方法是实现接口的唯一成员的回调方法。Its `ProvideIZipCode` method is the callback method that implements the interface's only member. 方法只返回接口的实例。The method simply returns an instance of the interface. 请注意, 该方法在其元`ConnectionProvider`数据中用特性标记。Note that the method is marked with a `ConnectionProvider` attribute in its metadata. 这是将方法标识为提供程序连接点的回调方法的机制。This is the mechanism for identifying the method as the callback method for the provider's connection point. 其他类命名`WeatherWebPart`为, 它充当连接的使用者。The other class is named `WeatherWebPart`, and it acts as the consumer for the connection. 此类具有一个名为`GetZipCode`的方法, 该方法从`IZipCode`提供程序控件获取接口的实例。This class has a method named `GetZipCode` that gets an instance of the `IZipCode` interface from the provider control. 请注意, 此方法在其元数据中被标记为使用者`ConnectionConsumer`的连接点方法和属性。Note that this method is marked as the consumer's connection point method with a `ConnectionConsumer` attribute in its metadata. 要使代码示例运行, 必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集, 并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者, 你可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中, 在此文件夹中, 它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练, 请参阅[演练:开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#4)] 此代码示例的第三部分是母版页。The third part of the code example is the master page. 你应采用以下源代码并将其保存到文件中, 并将其命名为 MasterPageCS 或 MasterPageVB (具体取决于你使用的语言)。You should take the following source code and save it in a file, naming it MasterPageCS.master or MasterPageVB.master (depending on which language you use). 请注意, 母版页包含`Register`注册用户控件的指令, 并且它在页面的正文中引用用户控件本身。Note that the master page contains a `Register` directive to register the user control, and it references the user control itself in the body of the page. 母版页还声明用于此页和``所有相关内容页的单个元素。The master page also declares the single `` element used for this page and all related content pages. 最后, 母版页包含一个``元素, 该元素声明内容页在页面中的插入位置。Finally, the master page has an `` element that declares the point in the page where the content page is inserted. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview/CS/MasterPageCS.master#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview/VB/MasterPageVB.master#1)] 此代码示例的第四部分是内容页。The fourth part of the code example is the content page. 应复制以下源代码, 并将其保存到扩展名为 .aspx 的文件中。You should copy the following source code and save it in a file with an .aspx extension. 请注意, `Page`其指令包含`MasterFile`用于引用母版页的属性。Notice that its `Page` directive contains a `MasterFile` attribute to refer to the master page. 此外, 此页还包含`Register`一个指令, 用于在包含参与连接的动态编译自定义控件的 App_Code 文件夹中注册文件。Also, this page has a `Register` directive to register the file in the App_Code folder that contains the dynamically compiled custom controls that participate in the connection. 在该页``的标记中, 有``一个元素, 其中包含一个子元素`` , 该子元素又具有子``元素来声明连接的详细信息。Within the `` tags of the page, there is an `` element, with a child `` element, which in turn has a child `` element to declare the details of the connection. 在页`

summary.span: 重写基属性，以阻止 控件包含其他控件。

span.span: Overrides the base property to prevent the control from containing controls.
Always returns an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法会重写基方法, 以防止控件包含和返回控件的集合。 The method overrides the base method to prevent the control from containing and returning collections of controls. 其唯一目的是使静态连接可以在使用母版页的应用程序内的内容页中声明。Its only purpose is to enable static connections to be declared in content pages within an application that uses master pages.

public: virtual property bool EnableTheming { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 重写基属性，以防止使用主题。

span.span: Overrides the base property to prevent themes from being used.

value.span: 始终返回 ，以防止使用主题。

span.span: Always returns , to prevent themes from being used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性重写基属性, 以防止主题与控件一起使用。 The property overrides the base property to prevent themes from being used with the control. 这是为了防止它与母版页 (其 属性始终返回`true`) 中的控件所使用的任何主题发生冲突。This is to prevent it coming into conflict with any themes being used with the control in the master page (its property always returns `true`).

exception.span: 调用方尝试为此属性赋值。

span.span: A caller tries to assign a value to this property.

public: override void Focus();
override this.Focus : unit -> unit

summary.span: 重写基方法，以防止该方法被调用。

span.span: Overrides the base method to prevent the method from being called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果任何调用方尝试调用方法, 方法将重写基方法并引发异常。The method overrides the base method and throws an exception if any caller attempts to call the method. 这是因为, 继承方法是为具有用户界面 (UI) 的控件设计的, 但该控件没有 UI, 因此无需设置焦点。This is because the inherited method is designed for controls with a user interface (UI), but the control has no UI and therefore has no need to set the focus.

exception.span: 调用方尝试调用此方法。

span.span: A caller tries to call this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用基方法, 然后执行任务来初始化控件。 The method calls the base method, and then carries out tasks to initialize the control. 此方法的一个重要任务是将属性引用的连接集合分配给控件的集合。An important task of this method is to assign the collection of connections referenced by the property to the control's collection.

exception.span: 关联母版页的 控件为 。

summary.span: 重写基属性，以防止对该基属性赋值。

span.span: Overrides the base property to prevent a value from being assigned.
Always returns an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性重写基属性, 以防止向其赋值, 这会阻止将外观与控件一起使用。 The property overrides the base property to prevent a value from being assigned to it, which has the effect of preventing skins from being used with the control. 这是因为控件从不公开页面上的用户界面 (UI)。This is done because the control never exposes a user interface (UI) on a page. 此行为是由控件为其属性实现的。The same behavior is implemented by the control for its property.

exception.span: 调用方尝试为此属性赋值。

span.span: A caller tries to assign a value to this property.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection StaticConnections { get; }
.property instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection StaticConnections

summary.span: 获取内容页上在 元素中声明的静态连接的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of static connections declared within the element on a content page.

value.span: 一个 ，该集合中包含在 元素中声明的所有静态 对象。

span.span: A that contains all static objects declared within an element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性引用元素中声明的对象的集合。 `` The property references the collection of objects declared in an `` element. 此集合中包含的连接被添加到控件的静态连接 (由其集合引用), 并与任何与该控件关联的其他连接完全相同。The connections contained in this collection are added to the static connections of the controls (referenced by its collection), and treated exactly like any other connections associated with the control. 与属性相对应的声明性元素``是元素。The declarative element that corresponds to the property is the `` element. 在使用母版页``的应用程序中, 元素添加``为内容页上``元素的子元素, 而中的元素``又作为元素的子元素添加。In an application that uses master pages, the `` element is added as a child of the `` element on a content page, and an `` element in turn is added as a child of the `` element. 可以``将多个元素添加到``一个元素, 多个内容页可以将静态连接作为母版页应用程序的一部分进行声明。Multiple `` elements can be added to one `` element, and multiple content pages can declare static connections as part of a master pages application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property on the class. 此代码示例仅显示声明控件的内容页中的代码的相关部分和静态连接。This code example shows only the relevant portion of the code from the content page that declares the control and the static connection. 对于运行代码示例所需的其他页面和有关如何设置它们的说明, 请参阅类概述的 "示例" 部分。For the other pages required to run the code example, and a description of how to set them up, see the Example section of the class overview. 下面的代码是将``元素声明为``元素的子元素的内容页。The following code is the content page that declares the `` element as a child of the `` element. 另请注意, `Button1_Click`该方法将检查控件上属性的计数, 并将其写入页面。Also note that the `Button1_Click` method checks the count of the property on the control and writes it to the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview/CS/contentPage1CS.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview/VB/contentPage1VB.aspx#2)] 在浏览器中加载页面后, 单击 " **WebPartManager 信息**" 按钮, 并观察有关母版页中的控件以及内容页中的控件的信息。After you load the page in a browser, click the **WebPartManager Information** button and observe the information about the control in the master page, and the control in the content page. 例如, 请注意, 它们各自在跟踪静态连接的属性 ( 属性) 中具有相同的计数。For example, note that they both have the same count in their respective properties that track static connections (the property).

summary.span: 重写基属性，以防止对该基属性赋值。

span.span: Overrides the base property to prevent a value from being assigned.

value.span: 始终返回 ，以防止控件被设置为可见控件。

span.span: Always returns , to prevent the control from being made visible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性重写基属性, 以防止控件被变为可见。 The property overrides the base property to prevent the control from ever being made visible. 控件(如控件) 没有用户界面 (UI), 也不会向用户显示。The control, like the control, has no user interface (UI) and is never displayed to the user.

exception.span: 调用方尝试为此属性赋值。

span.span: A caller tries to assign a value to this property.
